snippet: Amid reports that Israel is close to ordering a strike against Iran’s nuclear program, its deputy foreign minister sought a declaration from countries in negotiations with Iran.
abstract: Israeli Deputy Foreign Min Danny Ayalon calls for an international declaration that the diplomatic effort to halt Tehran's enrichment of uranium is dead; comments come after reports that Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu is close to ordering a military strike against Iran's nuclear program.
lead_paragraph: Amid reports that Israel is close to ordering a strike against Iran’s nuclear program, its deputy foreign minister sought a declaration from countries in negotiations with Iran.

headline.seo: Time to Call Diplomatic Effort on Iran a Failure, Israeli Official Says
headline.main: Israeli Minister Asks Nations to Say Iran Talks Have Failed
headline.print_headline: Israeli Official Calls for Declaration That Diplomacy on Iran Has Failed
